content.text: Match ends, Barcelona 5, Shakhtar Donetsk 1.
Second Half ends, Barcelona 5, Shakhtar Donetsk 1.
Javier Mascherano (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Eduardo da Silva (Shakhtar Donetsk).
Substitution, Barcelona. Ibrahim Afellay replaces Andrés Iniesta.
Attempt missed. Pedro (Barcelona) right footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Andrés Iniesta.
Goal!  Barcelona 5, Shakhtar Donetsk 1. Xavi (Barcelona) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Dani Alves.
Andrés Iniesta (Barcelona) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Mykola Ishchenko (Shakhtar Donetsk).
Offside, Shakhtar Donetsk. Douglas Costa tries a through ball, but Eduardo da Silva is caught offside.
Substitution, Shakhtar Donetsk. Eduardo da Silva replaces Tomás Hübschman.
Offside, Barcelona. Pedro tries a through ball, but Lionel Messi is caught offside.
Luiz Adriano (Shakhtar Donetsk) hits the left post with a right footed shot from a difficult angle on the right. Assisted by Henrikh Mkhitaryan.
Attempt missed. Andrés Iniesta (Barcelona) left footed shot from the centre of the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Pedro.
Foul by Alex Teixeira (Shakhtar Donetsk).
Pedro (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Xavi (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Tomás Hübschman (Shakhtar Donetsk).
Substitution, Barcelona. Maxwell replaces Adriano.
Fernandinho (Shakhtar Donetsk) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Gerard Piqué (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Fernandinho (Shakhtar Donetsk).
Substitution, Shakhtar Donetsk. Alex Teixeira replaces Willian.
Offside, Shakhtar Donetsk. Willian tries a through ball, but Razvan Rat is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Dani Alves (Barcelona) right footed shot from outside the box is too high from a direct free kick.
Foul by Fernandinho (Shakhtar Donetsk).
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Substitution, Barcelona. Pedro replaces David Villa.
Substitution, Shakhtar Donetsk. Fernandinho replaces Jadson.
Corner,  Shakhtar Donetsk. Conceded by Sergio Busquets.
Offside, Barcelona. Dani Alves tries a through ball, but David Villa is caught offside.
Yaroslav Rakitskiy (Shakhtar Donetsk) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
David Villa (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Yaroslav Rakitskiy (Shakhtar Donetsk).
Offside, Barcelona. Lionel Messi tries a through ball, but Sergio Busquets is caught offside.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Andriy Pyatov.
Attempt saved. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top left corner. Assisted by Dani Alves.
Goal!  Barcelona 4, Shakhtar Donetsk 1. Seydou Keita (Barcelona) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the top left corner. Assisted by Lionel Messi.

Goal!  Barcelona 3, Shakhtar Donetsk 1. Yaroslav Rakitskiy (Shakhtar Donetsk) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Darijo Srna with a cross following a set piece situation.
Andrés Iniesta (Barcelona) is shown the yellow card.
Darijo Srna (Shakhtar Donetsk) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Javier Mascherano (Barcelona).
Corner,  Shakhtar Donetsk. Conceded by Dani Alves.
Goal!  Barcelona 3, Shakhtar Donetsk 0. Gerard Piqué (Barcelona) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Xavi with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Andriy Pyatov.
Seydou Keita (Barcelona) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Mykola Ishchenko (Shakhtar Donetsk).

Second Half begins Barcelona 2, Shakhtar Donetsk 0.

Delay over. They are ready to continue.
